scripts.start: yarn codegen && yarn build:local && yarn remove:local && yarn create:local && yarn deploy:local
scripts.deploy:local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 chamber --version-label v0.0.1 --network localhost
scripts.deploy:sepolia: graph deploy --studio --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ loreum/loreum-registry-sepolia subgraph.yaml --network sepolia
scripts.deploy:mainnet: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ looksrare/aggregator subgraph.yaml --network mainnet
scripts.deploy:studio: graph codegen subgraph.yaml && graph build subgraph.yaml && graph deploy --studio chamber --network mainnet
scripts.test:lerna: graph codegen subgraph.yaml && graph build subgraph.yaml && graph test -r
